Node.definition: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to place before (someone); hence: = causative action by which humans pass on a message to other humans ◄ as if it were an object placed in front of them

Node.gloss: to acquire|to obtain|to purchase|to buy|to reclaim
Node.definition: = action by which humans acquire an animate or inanimate object ◄ by means of a financial transaction or in another way

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= member of ethnic group; ◄ descendant of Eber (עֵבֶר)
= state in which a countable entity is six in number

= state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range
literally: to go out; hence: = process by which a person or object is no longer under someone else's control
= state of not being under the control of someone else
= action by which someone performs an event as a favor, without expecting a reward or remuneration for it
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= the physical structure, including the bones, flesh, and organs, of a human being
= the physical structure, including the bones, flesh, and organs, of a human being

= a hinged barrier at the entrance to a town, building, or room; ◄ usually made out of wood, but occasionally also out of metal; ► provides or prevents access; ≈ sometimes associated with vulnerability
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= upright part of a door frame; a few passages mention square door frames and in such cases the horizontal elements are also referred to as doorposts
= causative action by which humans make a hole in an object with the help of a sharp pointed tool
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= hand tool with a narrow point; ► used for boring holes in wood, leather, or other substances; in the OT text only used for a ritual with regard to slaves

= state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: to be wrong or bad in the eyes (of someone); hence = state in which certain actions or patterns of behavior are considered bad or evil by (other) humans or deities, ► which often provokes them to anger

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= state in which something or someone is identified as different or strange from one's own perspective
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
literally: to set; hence: = action by which humans make a certain decision regarding something

= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= food provided to someone to live on
literally: covering; hence: the clothing that are needed for protection against the cold and enable people to function within their community

= action by which someone performs an event as a favor, without expecting a reward or remuneration for it

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not

= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans keep themselves hidden somewhere ► in order to attack other humans
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: to cause to happen to (someone's) hand; hence: causative process by which deities cause or allow something to happen to somebody
literally: to cause to happen to (someone's) hand; hence: = causative process by which deities cause or allow something to happen to somebody
literally: to put a place; hence: = action by which a deity takes a decision regarding the location where a certain activity will take place
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to act presumptuously|to presume|to defy|to scheme (against someone)
Node.definition: = process by which someone fails to see the limits of what is permitted or appropriate in view of one's status, and act accordingly, described as an inner boiling that eventually gives rise to action; ≈ often associated with sin, disobedience, aggression, and rebellion against God
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

= state in which someone is able to manipulate difficult circumstances in such a way that the outcome is favorable to the planner; ≈ sometimes used in a positive sense, but also used in a negative sense
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

= action by which humans secretly take possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even of other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching

Node.gloss: to hold, carry, have (in one's luggage)
Node.definition: literally: in (one's) hand; hence: = state of carrying an object physically in one's hand or as part of one's luggage
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= clenched hand; ► used in fighting
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to take to (one's) bed|to be confined to bed
Node.definition: literally: to fall on a bed; hence: = process by which humans become sick or wounded and are confined to their bed
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move through an area without a specific destination
= referent to the location outside of an object
= stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► used for walking or as attribute of a ruler, shepherd, or prophet; gives support to the sick and elderly; ≈ associated with authority and support

Node.gloss: to be free|to be innocent|to go unpunished
Node.definition: = state or process in which humans are not held responsible for actions committed in the past or for future commitments

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably
= stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= particle marking a proposition as a condition, and so limiting the scope or impact of what was stated before by making it dependent on another event
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans are involved in a violent struggle with other humans, primarily involving physical force
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which someone is pregnant
literally: to go out (from the womb); hence: = process by which children are born
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
= unfortunate event ► resulting in physical harm or injury
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= causative action by which humans or deities hold (other) humans responsible for an event that has taken place or that is to take place in the future
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= unfortunate event ► resulting in physical harm or injury

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children
= causative action by which humans kill other humans or animals by throwing rocks at them until they die

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= a sum of money demanded or paid, either legally or illegally, in exchange for a service, or in exchange for someone's freedom or someone's life
= causative action by which humans or deities hold (other) humans responsible for an event that has taken place or that is to take place in the future

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities hold (other) humans responsible for an event that has taken place or that is to take place in the future
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= causative action by which humans kill other humans or animals by throwing rocks at them until they die

= causative action by which humans or deities allow others entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by withdrawing a gate, door, window, lid, covering, or other boundary; ≈ sometimes associated with freedom, sometimes with being exposed, vulnerable

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= action by which humans break up and move earth or stone, usually with a tool, and with the purpose of creating a hole

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern
= causative action by which humans or deities cover a surface with their hands, a piece of cloth, a substance, or an object, ► often with the purpose of making this surface invisible or inaccessible
= process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= causative action by which humans divide an object or a set of objects into two or more parts

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= causative action by which humans divide an object or a set of objects into two or more parts
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: (what used to be done) before, in the past
Node.definition: = reference to times in the past when a certain activity used to take place repeatedly

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= action by which humans secretly take possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even of other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns
= causative action by which humans kill an animal by slicing the jugular vein and windpipe with a sharp bladed instrument ► to prepare its meat for a meal; ≈ associated with aggression
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money
= state in which a countable entity is five in number

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= state in which a countable entity is four in number

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns
